author: Jonathan Chait
title: Trump’s Coronavirus CEO Death Panel Backfires Hilariously
description: The short, unsuccessful history of Trump’s anti-public-health task force.
content: The Trump administration has been torn between a faction that takes public-health concerns seriously, and one that wishes to disregard it. The pro-public-health faction has argued that the country cannot resume normal economic activity until the public has so… [+6710 chars]
